skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the third ship of the Atlanta-class light cruisers, San Diego! I'm aiming to become the fleet's number one Super°ÓStar!
skins.acquisition: San Diego, making her shining debut! She shoots, she scores~ Yaay! Hehe, only a genius like me could come up with a one-of-a-kind intro like that!
skins.login: Yo, Commander! There's a lot of paper lying around here, so let's fold some paper airplanes and see whose fly the farthest!
skins.details: The skies don't just belong to the planes, but to clouds and stars as well!
skins.secretaryIdle1: My sisters always told me to ask if there's anything I don't understand. But, what if I still don't get it?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hrmmm... Is there some way to get everyone to know about how awesome I am?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ehhh? Commander, doesn't it get boring sitting there all day?
skins.secretaryTouch: Awright! It's my turn to be it! One, two, skip a few... Ninety-nine, a hundred! Here I come, Commander!
